toon10001,"2012-08-01T08:35:45.857Z","ACTUALLY BULKY THIS TIME!","

Bulk is a Breakout/Doom Box hero, and is a vast improvment over bulk 3.0 (He was still awesome, but bulk fixes some of these flaws as he is actually bulky.)
The bones are nothing special, if you own other hero factory sets then they are pretty much the same. Some long ones, short ones, and the shortest, of which are 3. Armour wise we have
column2: 3 gunmetal size 5, a body with a print unique to Bulk, some small size 3's in orange and one of those weapon pieces from the 3.0 line. But the best is the 2 5 long orange pieces , only appeared in thornraxx before. Other than that, a few technic pieces, a hero core, a zamor sphere and hero cuffs are all thats included

column1: Different, compared to other sets in the line. the way the rocket launcher
column2: and the cuffs are attached are nice, and using the new shoulder armour piece for leg bulkiness is&nbsp

column1: He is armoured up well, very bulky (as per his name) with shoulder armour (sadly that restricts head movement) and lots of armor. The back is covered with a shoe, which connects the rocket launcher allowing it to be put down when not in use. The cuffs are connected on his torso, instad of on a clip on a arm or leg which
column2: makes him even bulkier looking, even quite tough. I wish the ball in the launcher was orange or silver, and the lightsaber blades in the rocket launcher trans read or orange to fit in with his colour scheme (would of worked on voltix, lol)

column1: He is very fun to play with, the best hero from the summer wave and the second best overall (Breez still pwns him though.)
Coming next is my review of Stormer XL
column2: Thats all i have at the moment but I will get more and review them so just wait. Hopefully voltix or core hunter, or stringer are next, Nex and Xt4 will be last (if possible) and Speeda will vary.
